items.title: James McFadden surprised by O'Neill's call in Stuttgart vs Celtic game
items.description: James McFadden was surprised to see Celtic captain, Callum McGregor, start against Stuttgart.

items.title: Celtic hero casts doubt over managerial favourite's credentials amid speculation

items.mediaText: Jens Berthel Askou has earned rave reviews for his work at Motherwell and is currently the favourite to be the next Celtic manager. -  (SNS Group)

items.title: Martin O'Neill 'raging' with Celtic board as intel on unseen frustration made public

items.title: Stuttgart vs Celtic injury news: 13 out with key trio set to miss Europa League tie as O'Neill dealt fresh blow

items.mediaText: Stuttgart and Celtic have injury concerns ahead of their Europa League second-leg playoff in Germany this week. Cr: Getty Images. -  (AFP via Getty Images)
